FirstTalk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I keep hearing about the stylish clothes
they make in Hateno Village.

Take it from me—<sp:5:0:0>you can't underestimate
the power of a good wardrobe.

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>I used to be a total wallflower. Then I
learned how to dress myself, and boom—
I was a new woman!
Maybe you should go to Hateno Village
and try a new look for yourself.

It's located on the far side of Necluda
in southeast Hyrule.

Never know! Might change your life.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm traveling all over to learn what I can
about the latest trends.

Fashion never stops moving, see. I've got
to constantly work to keep up or I risk
getting left behind.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Come to think of it, there are people from
all over at Lookout Landing right now,
south of Hyrule Castle.
Might be a good place to learn the latest
fashion news—<sp:5:0:0>or any other kind of news,
for that matter.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Guess that'll be my next stop!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Aren't you afraid of monsters?


No matter how confident I am now, I still
cringe whenever I see a monster...

They just don't care how stylish you are!


When monsters are nearby, move carefully
to avoid their attention.
FirstTalk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>If you want trendy clothes, Hateno Village
is the place to go.

It's on the far side of Necluda, over there
in southeast Hyrule.

Why not check it out? You might be
surprised what a new outfit can do!
BeforeMeetPurah_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can have a nice, safe rest if you make
it to <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>. It's just<clr:0000> south <clr:ffff>of
<clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>.
Head for the tall tower. You can't miss it.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease>Thanks to you, I'll be<sp:5:0:0> *clack* <sp:5:0:0>fine as soon
as my <sp:5:0:0>*clack*<sp:5:0:0> teeth stop chattering.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A shop that can dye your clothes a new
color...<sp:5:0:0> I'd like to go at least once.

It's on the far side of Necluda in
southeastern Hyrule, so I'll have to
travel quite a ways.
But once I'm done here, I think I might
make the trip.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>When monsters are nearby, move carefully
to avoid their attention.
ComStylishTalk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey, are you looking for <clr:0000>Misko's
hidden treasure<clr:ffff>?

I want to stay on top of the fashion game,
so I've been trying to find it for ages.
ComStylishTalk_002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you also trying to find <clr:0000>Misko's
hidden treasure<clr:ffff>?
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>The <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>hiding <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff>'s treasure is
supposed to be around here...
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>You're not much of a talker, are you?


Well, if you like listening, I hear Lookout
Landing's a good place to pick up all sorts
of info. It's just south of Hyrule Castle.
I might go myself—<sp:5:0:0>see what I learn about
the latest fashion trends.
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>Whew.<sp:5:0:0> I can't take it anymore! <sp:5:0:0>If there's a
world without monsters, sign me up.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Tired_00>Thank few! <sp:5:0:0>Er,<sp:5:0:0> thank new! I mean... *sigh*<sp:5:1:0>
Just... Thanks!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare>I-I can't it anymore!<sp:5:0:0> My goosebumps
have goosebumps!
Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Wow! <sp:5:0:0>You saved my life!<sp:5:0:0> Please, take this.
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease>Whew! <sp:5:0:0>I didn't like that one bit. Thanks
for the help.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Th-that was awful!<sp:5:0:0> I would cry, except
that wouldn't go with this look at all.
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>There's a rumor that the <clr:0000>clothes <clr:ffff>hidden
by the <clr:0000>Great Bandit Misko <clr:ffff>are buried in
a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>near here.
But going into a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>takes courage that
I don't have. What if there are monsters?
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease>I can't believe I got out of there with
nothing worse than shaky knees.<sp:5:0:0> Thanks.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I heard there's a shop in <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>
that can dye your clothes a new color.

Hateno is on the far side of Necluda,
which is pretty far from here.

But it's a must for anyone who cares
about fashion. And I definitely care.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Hateno Village <clr:ffff>is on the far side of
Necluda in southeast Hyrule. It's not
exactly close.
But it's THE place to go if your outfit
fades and you need to have it re-dyed.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah...<sp:5:0:0> It refers to the <clr:0000>clothes <clr:ffff>hidden by
the <clr:0000>Great Bandit Misko<clr:ffff> ages ago.

There's a rumor that the treasure is
hidden in a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>near here.

As someone with a keen eye for fashion,
obviously I'd like to get my hands on it...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff> probably have monsters in
them. And how am I supposed to deal
with that, huh?
BeforeMeetPurah_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>You lost?<sp:5:1:0> If you're looking for a town or
village around here, try <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.
It's just south of Hyrule Castle.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>You'll be able to see the tower from a
ways off. Can't miss it.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>There are lots of monsters around these
days,<sp:5:0:0> so watch out.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Are you avoiding the rain too?


Getting wet is the worst!<sp:5:0:0> The rain is awful
for clothes.

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:TalkPositive>But get this—I heard there's a shop in
Hateno Village<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>that'll re-dye your outfits.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hateno is on the far side of Necluda in
southeast Hyrule. It's not exactly close.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But it's THE place to go if your outfit
fades or you want to freshen up your look.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rito Village is to the<clr:0000> northwest<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>or you
could go <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> to Goron City.

Zora's Domain<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>is <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> and if you want to
see Gerudo Town, go <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Surely a fancy adventurer like you has a
<clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>, right?
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal>Hold on, are you lost? <sp:5:0:0>Here, I can help.
We're in Hyrule Field, right? Well...

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Rito Village is to the<clr:0000> northwest<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>or you
could go <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> to Goron City.

Zora's Domain<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>is <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0> and if you want to
see Gerudo Town, go <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Just take a map and you'll be fine.
You...have a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>, right?
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah... <sp:5:0:0>It refers to the<clr:0000> legendary clothing<clr:ffff>
hidden by the <clr:0000>Great Bandit Misko<clr:ffff>.

There's a rumor that the treasure is
hidden in a <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>near here...

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>But I've been looking for ages, and it
isn't ANYWHERE.

I wonder if it has to do with me avoiding
any place there might be monsters.
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh, please! <sp:5:1:0>Don't waste your time talking
to me looking like that.<sp:0:4:0>Listen, your fashion sense—or lack of
fashion sense—is your own, but...<sp:0:4:0>I simply can NOT be guilty by association
of the fashion crimes you're committing
right now.
